info.title: Select an option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: openListboxToApple
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox, and sets the focused option to 'Apple' without selecting it

user: with focus on the listbox popup, select the focused option.
instructions.raw: with focus on the listbox popup, select the focused option.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Apple') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
